name: Korro's Life
description:
Thanks for playing with this weird little simulator. I don't know if it is fun to play with, but it was really fun to make.

Controls Reference:

Middle Mouse - switch mode

(spawn mode) Left Mouse - spawn female

(spawn mode) Right Mouse - spawn male

(select mode) Left Mouse - select Korro

FULL CREDITS:

Music:

Brittle Rille by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3460-brittle-rille
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

SFX:
